action.action-desc: Mr. Gallego (for himself, Mr. O'Halleran, and Ms. Rosen) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to increase adjustments of monthly basic pay for members of the uniformed services, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Give Our Troops a Raise Act of 2017.

section.header: Adjustments of monthly basic pay for members of the uniformed services
section.text: Section 1009(c)(2) of title 37, United States Code, is amended by striking 2004, 2005, and 2006, and inserting 2018 and 2019.
